recommended_degree: Administrasi, Administrasi BIsnis, Teknik  Industri, Akuntansi, Administrasi Perkantoran (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
Assist in preparing and processing sales documents such as quotations, purchase orders, and invoices.

Maintain and update customer databases, sales records, and tracking sheets.

Support the sales team by handling daily administrative tasks and coordinating with internal departments.

Respond to customer inquiries through email or phone and provide accurate information.

Prepare weekly and monthly sales reports for management review.

Help monitor order status, delivery schedules, and customer follow-ups.

Assist in organizing sales meetings, presentations, and supporting materials.

Conduct basic market research to support the sales team in identifying potential customers.

Ensure proper filing and documentation of sales-related materials.
